definition: forced labor/corvée/obligatory task/military service/to use as servant/to enserf/servant (old)/war/campaign/battle

sentences.english: Those are only our decoration, coz we never follow the money.
sentences.chinese: 那只是偶们的装饰品，偶们从来不会被钱奴役。

sentences.english: We shall never submit to slavery.
Before being liberated from slavery, these people had been scorned and used and treated as outcasts.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人脱离奴役前，饱受嘲弄利用，被视作贱民。

sentences.english: Aristotle tells us that slavery is natural.
sentences.chinese: 亚里士多德告诉我们奴役是自然的演变。

sentences.english: The question is what did Aristotle mean by slavery?
sentences.chinese: 问题是亚里士多德所谓的奴役为何？

sentences.english: Mind flayers enslaved entire races, including the githyanki forerunners.
sentences.chinese: 夺心魔奴役着整个种族，包括吉斯洋基人的先驱者们。

sentences.english: Some describe their work as “slave labour”.
sentences.chinese: 有些人说自己从事“奴役劳动”。

sentences.english: It either frees us or enslaves us.
sentences.chinese: 它能让我们自由也会奴役我们。

sentences.english: They suffered a lot under the invader's heel.
sentences.chinese: 在侵略者的铁蹄下，他们受尽了奴役。
正如奥黛比说的“从奴役中得到解放”。

sentences.english: The Qur'an was able to hold the Arabic language in thrall from the moment it was revealed.
sentences.chinese: 古兰从被降示那一刻起便能保护阿拉伯语免遭奴役。

sentences.english: We had several bells and whistles that we all slaved long hours to implement based on our product requirements.
sentences.chinese: 我们被产品的需求奴役了很长时间。

sentences.english: I enjoy playing with toys and bondage, and role playing is fun too.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢玩玩具和奴役，角色扮演也很有趣。

sentences.english: The prisoners were used as slave labour in local armament factories.
sentences.chinese: 被关押的人被奴役用来在当地的武器厂中卖苦力。

sentences.english: It is considered the least known and most widely used method of enslaving people worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 这是全世界最不为人所知却最普遍的奴役形式。

sentences.english: And he is the only animal who enslaves.
sentences.chinese: 人也是唯一的奴役他人的动物。

definition: to ravage/to devastate/to trample on/to violate
